feature: BEAN & LEAF: Brew perfectly balanced loose-leaf teas and coffee grounds with one touch, automatic ease.
STRENGTH CONTROL: Backlit LED touch sensor panel includes; light, medium, and strong strength controls, safety warning, and refresh cycle.
REFRESH CYCLE: Exclusive refresh cycle enlivens tea leaves for maximum flavor infusion. Great for all kinds of black, green, white, oolong and herbal teas.
BEAN & LEAF: Brew perfectly balanced loose-leaf teas and coffee grounds with one touch, automatic ease.
STRENGTH CONTROL: Backlit LED touch sensor panel includes; light, medium, and strong strength controls, safety warning, and refresh cycle.
REFRESH CYCLE: Exclusive refresh cycle enlivens tea leaves for maximum flavor infusion. Great for all kinds of black, green, white, oolong and herbal teas.
PURE & CLEAR: Extra-fine stainless steel mesh strainer, 4 cup sparkling glass carafe and brew chamber ensure complete flavor purity. Water reservoir holds 32 oz.
ETL CERTIFIED: We, at Gourmia, take the quality of our products seriously. This product is ETL certified so you can be confident that you’re receiving a safe, efficient, high quality appliance.
